text: Hernandia stenura is a species of plant in the Hernandiaceae family. It is found in Costa Rica, Nicaragua, and Panama. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Hernandia stenura. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. title: Hernandia stenura
